comments:
i20040310

Got this using the Sync view to update some projects. A UI dialog showed up
saying something bad happened with SWT and asking if I would like to shutdown,
and I said no. Everything seemed to work fine after that.

dialog, everything seems to work fine (the actions complete execution).

Item not removed
BTW, I haven't seen this for some time now.

That means you are about to crash or run out of resources (or we have a very 
subtle bug feeding GetMenuItemInfo() in certain cases).  I'm going to close 
this and you can reopen it if it happens again.

just happened to me on 3.1, winXP
The whole eclipse went down in flames. Hardcrash. Not sure if this is what
caused it though.
I think what I did is open a Lotus *.123 file inside eclipse which made it open
inside the editor area. Then I wanted to close it and it wanted to save. I
pressed no. 

Below there are 2 exceptions. Maybe they're related, so I will paste them
together here.
